ygData.subject: Re: Pixie strike versus interrupting spell casters
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, that s good to know.  I never knew there was a case where the spell just failed due to outside interference.  I was under the impression that all external
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, that's good to know. I never knew there was a case where the spell just
failed due to outside interference. I was under the impression that all
external inputs got a channel 'save'.

Thanks John!

Golias, Sol Ro


====================================


Prior to this, my experience was that Lullaby, Pixie Strike,
stun, and mesmerize would interrupt 100% of the time if it
wasn't resisted and stuck before they finished casting.
They're equivalent to being stunned by a mob - that will
interrupt your casting 100% regardless of channeling.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
